sitename: Nature's Wisdom Healing Center - Mary Cetan
cleaned_text: Standard Process's SP Detox Balance program provides key nutrients to support three phases of detoxification in the body: 1. Unlock toxins; 2. Neutralize toxins 3. Eliminate toxins. The 28-day and 10-day programs feature a tasty, all-in-one detox shake, in vanilla or chai flavor. Along with drinking the nutrient rich shake, eating regular meals of mostly vegetables, lean proteins, some fruits and healthy fats makes this a very nourishing way to support the natural detoxification process of the body. [SP-Detox-Balance-Flyer](https://sarasotaacupunctureclinic.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/SP-Detox-Balance-Flyer.pdf) [Purchase SP Detox Balance program online here.](https://natureswisdomhealingcenter.standardprocess.com/Products?page=1&searchTerm=SP%20Detox%20Balance%E2%84%A2%20Chai%2C%2028-Day%20Program%20Kit) Watch the video below to find out WHY detoxification is needed to support BEST HEALTH! Also learn more about the 3 phases of detoxification supported with SP Detox Balance. [Purchase SP Detox Balance program online here.](https://natureswisdomhealingcenter.standardprocess.com/Products) SP Detox Balance Program Guide [SP-Detox-Balance-Program-Guide](https://sarasotaacupunctureclinic.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/09/SP-Detox-Balance-Program-Guide.pdf) Use the Standard Process Detoxing Made Delicious cookbook below to help you make positive changes in your daily diet. [LN1034_Detox-Recipe-PDF_Interactive](https://sarasotaacupunctureclinic.com/wp-content/uploads/2019/10/LN1034_Detox-Recipe-PDF_Interactive.pdf) Use the Standard Process 1° of Change cookbook below to guide you towards a healthier diet and lifestyle. This book also introduces the Standard Process 21-Day Purification program, the original Standard Process detox program still available today. [1-Degree-of-Change Cleanse CookBook](https://sarasotaacupunctureclinic.com/wp-content/uploads/2018/01/1-Degree-of-Change.pdf) At Nature's Wisdom Healing Center-Mary Cetan, we have found that implementing the nutrient rich supplements from Standard Process and the ultimate quality herbal products from MediHerb help us to give our patients the results for which they are hoping. [Purchase Standard Process products online here.](https://natureswisdomhealingcenter.standardprocess.com/Products?page=1&searchTerm=SP%20Detox%20Balance%E2%84%A2%20Chai%2C%2028-Day%20Program%20Kit) If you would like to pick up a detoxification program at the clinic, please reach out on form below.
